last_episode_to_air.name: Lost in Space
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Neil Armstrong and David Scott try to complete the world's first orbital docking mission, the Agena space module begins a violent tumble causing the astronauts to make an emergency landing from space.

name: Expeditions to the Edge
overview: Stories tell of amazing actual expeditions

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Stories tell of amazing actual expeditions.

episodes.name: Lost in the Jungle
episodes.overview: A group of scientists and a film crew suffers a series of tragic mishaps as they explore Peru's Rio Abiseo Park.

episodes.name: Into Galeras Volcano
episodes.overview: A team of scientists head to the mouth of the Galeras Volcano to try and predict the next eruption.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: No Turning Back After crossing the North Pacific, the Infinity arrives in Dutch Harbor. Unprepared for the arctic, the crew uses this opportunity to stock up on supplies and ready the boat before making their way into the mouth of the treacherous Northwest Passage.

episodes.name: Saharan Nightmare
episodes.overview: A race across the Moroccan Sahara becomes a race for survival when a sandstorm strands a runner in the desert with only a day's worth of water.

episodes.name: Climbers Kidnapped
episodes.overview: It All Falls Apart Fear of overwintering in the Arctic becomes more and more real as the crew becomes trapped in ice. Meanwhile, tensions on the ship reach a boiling part pushing one crew member over the edge.

episodes.name: Rampaging River
episodes.overview: An American whitewater paddling team travels deep into Tibet's Tsango Gorge to run the "Everest of rivers."

episodes.name: Hostage Mountain
episodes.overview: American rock-climbers face gunfire from Islamic militants in Kyrgyzstan.

episodes.name: Mt. Hood Crash
episodes.overview: An expedition to the summit of Mt. Hood takes a violent turn when climbers are swept into a lethal crevasse and the rescue helicopter sent to save them crashes.

episodes.name: Trapped Divers
episodes.overview: Rescuers try to save a trapped cave diver who ran into trouble after plunging 250 feet below ground in New Zealand.

episodes.name: Sunken Sub
episodes.overview: Four men on an experimental minisub get tangled in the wreck of a sunken warship and must wait for the Navy to rescue them.

episodes.name: A Family Adrift
episodes.overview: A family fights to survive when killer whales attack its schooner.

episodes.name: Galeras Volcano
episodes.overview: The Galeras Volcano erupts while scientists, tourists and reporters explore the volcano, killing nine people.

episodes.name: Iditarod
episodes.overview: Men and women competing in the Iditarod find themselves fighting to survive when a blizzard with sub-freezing temperatures and heavy winds hits the coast of Alaska.

episodes.name: Lost in Space
episodes.overview: As Neil Armstrong and David Scott try to complete the world's first orbital docking mission, the Agena space module begins a violent tumble causing the astronauts to make an emergency landing from space.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Stories tell of amazing actual expeditions.
